about_the_game:
This technical test for Kommando is meant to stress test the current build and get player feedback about basic mechanics, movement, and gunplay. The vision for Kommando is centred around "back to basics" competitive gameplay where players will experience tactical, team-based gameplay in settings from around the world while playing as some of the most recognized and prestigious counter-terrorism and law enforcement units. The core experience will revolve around small team operations in a highly competitive multiplayer setting where communication and tactics matter.

This game is being developed by a small development team with the assistance of competitive FPS players to bring you the most authentic experience possible.

content_descriptors.notes: military reenacted violence, gun violence, detailed headshots

The vision for Kommando is centred around "back to basics" competitive gameplay where players will experience tactical, team-based gameplay in settings from around the world while playing as some of the most recognized and prestigious counter-terrorism and law enforcement units. The core experience will revolve around small team operations in a highly competitive multiplayer setting where communication and tactics matter.

This game is being developed by a small development team with the assistance of competitive FPS players to bring you the most authentic experience possible.
name: V3: KOMMANDO (Tech Preview)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3/AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: intel i7/AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: Kommando is an online competitive tactical shooter set in fictional but realistic locations from all across the globe. It features a competitive 5v5 FPS experience inspired by tactical shooters of the past and present.
